metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36328 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1. A heap-based buffer overflow in function WebPDecodeRGBInto is possible due to an invalid check for buffer size. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: libwebp package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu0.21.04.1').
